title: Mo - The Talking Dog
description: Take one puppy born without the ability to bark;Add one veterinarian who believes that dogs could talk like parrots, given the right surgery;Throw in a scientist who works for a company specialising in growing genetically-modified tissue;What you get is a dog with a unique ability and an attitude problem. You also get a confused family, offended neighbours and some very scared cats.
author: Michelle  Booth
